0:
SELECT 
    (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM customers WHERE Currency = 'EUR') * 1.0 / 
    (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM customers WHERE Currency = 'CZK') AS EUR_to_CZK_ratio;	----- bird -----	debit_card_specializing
1:
SELECT CustomerID, MIN(Consumption) AS LeastConsumption
FROM yearmonth
WHERE CustomerID IN (SELECT CustomerID FROM customers WHERE Segment = 'LAM')
AND Date LIKE '2012%'
GROUP BY CustomerID;	----- bird -----	debit_card_specializing
2:
SELECT AVG(Consumption) AS AverageMonthlyConsumption
FROM yearmonth
WHERE CustomerID IN (SELECT CustomerID FROM customers WHERE Segment = 'SME')
AND Date LIKE '2013%';	----- bird -----	debit_card_specializing
3:
SELECT 
    SUM(CASE WHEN c.Currency = 'CZK' THEN ym.Consumption ELSE 0 END) AS CZK_Consumption,
    SUM(CASE WHEN c.Currency = 'EUR' THEN ym.Consumption ELSE 0 END) AS EUR_Consumption,
    SUM(CASE WHEN c.Currency = 'CZK' THEN ym.Consumption ELSE 0 END) - 
    SUM(CASE WHEN c.Currency = 'EUR' THEN ym.Consumption ELSE 0 END) AS Consumption_Difference
FROM 
    yearmonth ym
JOIN 
    customers c ON ym.CustomerID = c.CustomerID
WHERE 
    ym.Date LIKE '2012%'	----- bird -----	debit_card_specializing
4:
SELECT SUBSTR(Date, 1, 4) AS Year, SUM(Consumption) AS TotalConsumption
FROM yearmonth
JOIN customers ON yearmonth.CustomerID = customers.CustomerID
WHERE customers.Currency = 'CZK'
GROUP BY Year
ORDER BY TotalConsumption DESC
LIMIT 1;	----- bird -----	debit_card_specializing
5:
SELECT Date, MAX(Consumption) AS PeakConsumption
FROM yearmonth
WHERE CustomerID IN (SELECT CustomerID FROM customers WHERE Segment = 'SME') AND Date LIKE '2013%'
GROUP BY Date
ORDER BY PeakConsumption DESC
LIMIT 1;	----- bird -----	debit_card_specializing
6:
ERROR: (sqlite3.OperationalError) no such column: Segment
[SQL: SELECT 
    AVG(CASE WHEN Segment = 'SME' THEN Consumption END) - AVG(CASE WHEN Segment = 'LAM' THEN Consumption END) AS SME_LAM,
    AVG(CASE WHEN Segment = 'LAM' THEN Consumption END) - AVG(CASE WHEN Segment = 'KAM' THEN Consumption END) AS LAM_KAM,
    AVG(CASE WHEN Segment = 'KAM' THEN Consumption END) - AVG(CASE WHEN Segment = 'SME' THEN Consumption END) AS KAM_SME
FROM 
    yearmonth 
WHERE 
    CustomerID IN (SELECT CustomerID FROM customers WHERE Currency = 'CZK') 
    AND Date LIKE '2013%';]
(Background on this error at: https://sqlalche.me/e/20/e3q8)	----- bird -----	debit_card_specializing
7:
SELECT Segment, 
       (SUM(CASE WHEN Date LIKE '2013%' THEN Consumption ELSE 0 END) - 
        SUM(CASE WHEN Date LIKE '2012%' THEN Consumption ELSE 0 END)) / 
       NULLIF(SUM(CASE WHEN Date LIKE '2012%' THEN Consumption ELSE 0 END), 0) * 100 AS PercentageIncrease
FROM customers c
JOIN yearmonth ym ON c.CustomerID = ym.CustomerID
WHERE c.Currency = 'EUR' AND c.Segment IN ('SME', 'LAM', 'KAM')
GROUP BY Segment
ORDER BY PercentageIncrease DESC;	----- bird -----	debit_card_specializing
8:
SELECT SUM(Consumption) AS TotalConsumption 
FROM yearmonth 
WHERE CustomerID = 6 AND Date BETWEEN '201308' AND '201311';	----- bird -----	debit_card_specializing
9:
SELECT 
    (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM gasstations WHERE Country = 'CZE' AND Segment = 'Value for money') - 
    (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM gasstations WHERE Country = 'SVK' AND Segment = 'Value for money') AS DiscountDifference;	----- bird -----	debit_card_specializing
10:
SELECT 
    (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM customers WHERE Segment = 'SME' AND Currency = 'CZK') - 
    (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM customers WHERE Segment = 'SME' AND Currency = 'EUR') AS Difference;	----- bird -----	debit_card_specializing
11:
SELECT (COUNT(*) * 100.0 / (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM yearmonth WHERE CustomerID IN (SELECT CustomerID FROM customers WHERE Segment = 'LAM'))) AS Percentage
FROM yearmonth
WHERE CustomerID IN (SELECT CustomerID FROM customers WHERE Segment = 'LAM') AND Consumption > 46.73;	----- bird -----	debit_card_specializing
12:
SELECT (COUNT(DISTINCT CustomerID) * 100.0 / (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT CustomerID) FROM yearmonth WHERE Date LIKE '201202%')) AS Percentage
FROM yearmonth
WHERE Date LIKE '201202%' AND Consumption > 528.3;	----- bird -----	debit_card_specializing
13: SELECT MAX(Consumption) FROM yearmonth WHERE Date LIKE '2012%';	----- bird -----	debit_card_specializing
14:
SELECT p.Description 
FROM products p 
JOIN transactions_1k t ON p.ProductID = t.ProductID 
WHERE t.Date BETWEEN '2013-09-01' AND '2013-09-30';	----- bird -----	debit_card_specializing
15:
SELECT DISTINCT g.Country 
FROM gasstations g 
JOIN transactions_1k t ON g.GasStationID = t.GasStationID 
WHERE t.Date BETWEEN '2013-06-01' AND '2013-06-30';	----- bird -----	debit_card_specializing
16:
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT c.CustomerID) 
FROM customers c 
JOIN yearmonth ym ON c.CustomerID = ym.CustomerID 
WHERE c.Currency = 'EUR' AND ym.Consumption > 1000;	----- bird -----	debit_card_specializing
17:
SELECT p.Description 
FROM transactions_1k t 
JOIN gasstations g ON t.GasStationID = g.GasStationID 
JOIN products p ON t.ProductID = p.ProductID 
WHERE g.Country = 'CZE'	----- bird -----	debit_card_specializing
18: SELECT DISTINCT Time FROM transactions_1k WHERE GasStationID IN (SELECT GasStationID FROM gasstations WHERE ChainID = 11);	----- bird -----	debit_card_specializing
19:
SELECT COUNT(*) 
FROM transactions_1k t 
JOIN gasstations g ON t.GasStationID = g.GasStationID 
WHERE g.Country = 'CZE' AND t.Date > '2012-01-01';	----- bird -----	debit_card_specializing
